binding:binding.name: FTP Upload Binding
binding:binding.description: This binding is for receiving files via FTP.
binding:binding.author: Pauli Anttila

parameter.name: port
parameter.label: TCP Port
parameter.description: TCP port of the FTP server

parameter.name: idleTimeout
parameter.label: Idle timeout
parameter.description: The number of seconds before an inactive client is disconnected. If this value is set to 0, the idle time is disabled.
